txt.en: 'The wealth within should command Igbâl's attention. I could not have succeeded in this venture without your aid. Please, visit me at my camp in Jirush. I wish to speak more before I bring this to Igbâl, and prove myself worthy to court his daughter.'
Instance: Wealth of the Dead
Raphûz looks concerned, you should speak with him
Tell Raphûz you are ready to claim the chest
'I am prepared if you are, my friend. I do not wish to linger near this place any longer than we must. I will admit, there is a sense of dread washing over me.'
Speak with Raphûz
'There is fear in my heart, yes. But your resolve strengthens mine, [placeholder]. We will find what we need and I prove my worth to Igbâl. I know this. We should press on.'
Raphûz confirms his resolve and continues forward
Raphûz wishes to claim a treasure from a wealthy tomb in Nirgambâr. You agreed to assist him as he searches this place of the dead.
You ventured deeper into the ruins of Nirgambâr. Raphûz's resolve is holding, but he looks nervous.
In the shadow of an ancient tomb, Raphûz awaits your counsel.
'Rise and defend me!'

'There, my friend, do you see? A chest. Undoubtedly it holds the treasure we seek. I have not faced such enemies until now and I will not let these few more deter me from this prize.'

Raphûz adjusts his weapon.

'Come, [placeholder]. Let us finish this!'
Assist and protect Raphûz as he searches for treasure
Assist and protect Raphûz as he searches for treasure
After fighting through the dead, you and Raphûz see the treasure he seeks. A small cadre of guards stands between you and Raphûz's goal.
Raphûz paused his advance and looks in need of reassurance
Raphûz is too injured to continue. You have failed
Help Raphûz obtain the chest
Raphûz awaits your counsel and assistance to begin
Raphûz is too injured to continue. You have failed
You fought your way through the Dead at Nirgambâr to obtain a chest containing riches for Raphûz. Raphûz stands near the prize and looks pleased.
Raphûz eyes the chest and beckons you closer
Raphûz is too injured to continue. You have failed
